text: What passing-bells for these who die as cattle?&& Only the monstrous anger of the guns.
Only the monstrous anger of the guns.&& Only the stuttering rifles' rapid rattle
Only the stuttering rifles' rapid rattle%% Can patter out their hasty orisons.
Can patter out their hasty orisons.&& No mockeries now for them; no prayers nor bells;
No mockeries now for them; no prayers nor bells;&& Nor any voice of mourning save the choirs,
Nor any voice of mourning save the choirs,&& The shrill, demented choirs of wailing shells;
The shrill, demented choirs of wailing shells;&& And bugles calling for them from sad shires.
And bugles calling for them from sad shires.&& What candles may be held to speed them all?
What candles may be held to speed them all?&& Not in the hands of boys, but in their eyes
Not in the hands of boys, but in their eyes%% Shall shine the holy glimmers of good-byes.
Shall shine the holy glimmers of good-byes.&& The pallor of girls' brows shall be their pall;
The pallor of girls' brows shall be their pall;&& Their flowers the tenderness of patient minds,
Their flowers the tenderness of patient minds,&& And each slow dusk a drawing-down of blinds.
